attributes.action: ensure that Neighbours stays on the BBC.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The BBC are apparently on the verge of losing the rights to broadcast Neighbours, to either ITV or Channel 5. As part of the British Empire, we must insist Australia continues to provide the show to Britain's national broadcaster.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "ensure that Neighbours stays on the BBC."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page12794.asp

Prime Minister's Office
